select pros_id , pros_nm , cell_ph_no , cell_ph_tno , cell_ph_pno , eml_id , eml_domain

mapper.insert:
select (seq_pros.nextval+1000000000)as pros_id from dual
insert into prospect(pros_id, created_by, last_upd_by, pros_nm, cell_ph_no, cell_ph_tno, cell_ph_pno, eml_id, eml_domain) values(#{pros_id}, #{created_by}, #{last_upd_by}, #{pros_nm}, #{cell_ph_no}, #{cell_ph_tno}, #{cell_ph_pno}, #{eml_id}, #{eml_domain})
mapper.update: update prospect set pros_nm = #{pros_nm}, cell_ph_no = #{cell_ph_no}, cell_ph_tno = #{cell_ph_tno}, cell_ph_pno = #{cell_ph_pno}, eml_id = #{eml_id}, eml_domain = #{eml_domain}, last_upd_by = #{last_upd_by}, last_upd = sysdate where pros_id = #{pros_id}
